<Heading as={"h1"} className={"openapi__heading"} children={"删除自定义域名"} />

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/deployments/{deployment_name}/delete_custom_domain"} context={"endpoint"} />

从部署中移除自定义域名。


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"请求"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"deployment_name","in":"path","description":"部署名称","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"请求体"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["requestDestination","domain"],"properties":{"domain":{"type":"string","description":"要删除的自定义域名。"},"requestDestination":{"description":"该自定义域名的目标（convexCloud 或 convexSite）。","type":"string","enum":["convexCloud","convexSite"],"title":"RequestDestination"}},"title":"PlatformDeleteCustomDomainArgs"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":""}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
